articles.description: Breeze Airways to add service to Islip, New York's Long Island MacArthur Airport and Florida's Palm Beach International Airport in mid-February.
articles.content:

articles.title: BuzzFeed shares close down 11% on first day of trading after SPAC merger - CNBC
articles.description: Shares of BuzzFeed, a digital media company, fell Monday after going public through a special purpose acquisition company.
articles.content:
Shares of digital media company BuzzFeed dipped Monday after briefly spiking on its first day of public market trading after merging with a special purpose acquisition company.

articles.title: FBI Jacksonville warns of scams affecting local shoppers - WJXT News4JAX
articles.description: Scammers are ready to pounce now that the holidays are here. You may think you won’t fall prey — but crooks can be sneaky — and if they get to you, it will hit you where it hurts the most: your wallet.
